Text: It says there are no seeds, but trust me.  At minimum, there is at least me, and I've got a 3mbps DL/UL connection.
Throwing my full 4mbps upload into this torrent.  Get it while the gettin's good!
45gb Upped so far.  Help seed as long as possible!
350gb Uploaded, and 17 seeds.  Keep up the good work, everyone!
Over 500gb uploaded, and we're not up to 14 seeds.  Good job, everyone!  Hope you enjoy the series as much as I did.
Thank you so much for this!! You can add me also to the seeders list ^-^
Note to downloaders:  Because this torrent is almost entirely on PEX and DHT, the number of seeds is roughly about 4x what's listed on Pirate Bay.
